name: West Lake Loop
description: Experience this 11.3-km loop trail near Hangzhou, Zhejiang. Generally considered an easy route, it takes an average of 2 h 6 min to complete. This is a very popular area for road biking, running, and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are June through August. Dogs are welcome and may be off-leash in some areas.
